_description: On chattering in church — six macaronic 3-line stanzas

BodDou104.First Lines:
Tutiuillus þe deuyl of hellHe wryteþ har names soþe
                    to tell…
BodDou104.Last Lines:
…þe blis of heuen þan may ȝe wyngod bryng vs al
                    to his InAmen Amen dicentes
BodDou104.Editions:
Wright,  Thomas,  and  James Orchard Halliwell-Phillipps, eds.

         2 vols. London: Smith, 1845: 1.257.

         27 (1904): 283-319: 223.

                        ed.  
             Religious Lyrics of the XVth Century.

Davies,  Reginald Thorne. 
             Medieval English Lyrics: a critical anthology.

Sisam,  Celia,  and  Kenneth Sisam, eds.  
             The Oxford Book of Medieval English Verse.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1970: 484-5.
